episode: I feel like I'm the only one that does anything around the house to try to keep it tidy.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm so upset, I feel like I'm the only person in the house that actually picks up after myself and that tries to keep the house somewhat tidy.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds really frustrating. It's tough when you feel like the responsibility falls all on you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It's not just a feeling, it's knowledge that it falls on me.  Someone can leave a wrapper on the counter from a food package and if I didn't pick it up it would sit there for a week.  It's like I'm the only one that can't ignore mess.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That must be so overwhelming for you.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It is highly overwhelming. I already struggle with feeling like I can't accomplish things and then when I take the time to think I realize I spend more time than I should picking up after others.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry you're dealing with this. It's not fair.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: No it's not.  I wish I knew what I could do to get others to help.  Reasoning hasn't worked, yelling doesn't work.  Showing my anger doesn't work either.  Even joking about it hasn't netted any help.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's really tough. Maybe a family meeting could help?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Tried that.  I get promises that things will be better but literally within 24 hours it's back to where it was and I wasted my breath and energy on it that I could have spent just doing it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm so sorry you're going through this.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thanks

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Anytime.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Don't suppose you have any other suggestions aside from attempting to ignore the mess?

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Maybe setting specific chores for everyone?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Ha! Yeah that doesn't work either.  Duties get shirked fast

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That sounds exhausting.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Very very exhausting.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: I'm sorry you're feeling this way.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Thank you.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome.
